title: String literals should support \e escape
body:
by **kballard**: 
Go string literals should support the \e sequence as an escape for 033 (ESC). Every
other language that I know of that supports escapes in string literals supports \e. It
seems rather surprising that Go doesn't (and makes it more annoying to print ANSI color
escapes).

Mac OS X 10.7.3, go version go1.
